ALISHA.I must say, it's quite heartwarming to s: I must say it's quite heartwarming to see smiling faces from people who have endured so much

ALISHA.We've all been through quite a lot from: We've all been through quite a lot from the sounds of things

ALISHA.Perhaps this pure experience is the sort: Perhaps this pure experience is the sort that will become commonplace in a world free of hellions and malevolence

I'd hold that thought, if I were you.

DYLE.I'm telling you Velvet, it wasn't me!: I'm telling you Velvet, it wasn't me!

DYLE.I-I don't have it, I swear! I swear on m: I, I don't have it I swear! I swear on my pride as a sailor!

VELVET.And besides. You're more a lizard than s: And besides. You're more a lizard than sailor these days anyway.

DYLE.Then on my pride as a lizard then!: Then on my pride as a lizard then!

MEDISSA.I've been looking all over for you. Kamo: I've been looking all over for you. Kamoana was acting suspiciously earlier.

MEDISSA.When I asked her to turn out her pockets: When I asked her to turn out her pockets, she handed over this pouch of gald.

MEDISSA.She said that Dyle gave it to her so tha: She said that Dyle gave it to her so that she could keep it safe.

MEDISSA.I hear that she was promised a 50/50 spl: I hear that she was promised a 50 50 split for her discretion.

DYLE.Sh-She's lying, Velvet! It was her idea: Sh-She's lying, Velvet! It was her idea from the start honest

DYLE.Kamoana told me that it would be a harml: Kamoana told me that it would be a harmless little prank.

DYLE.We just needed to hide that pouch where: We just needed to hide that pouch where you couldn't find it for a little while.

MEDISSA.Blaming a child for a clear act of thiev: Blaming a child for a clear act of thievery?

MEDISSA.Dyle, I expected better even from someon: Dyle I expected better even from someone like you. Surely your pride as a sailor is worth more than a stolen bag of gald?

His pride as a lizard perhaps.

VELVET.Come here. Even pirates like you should: Come here. Even pirates like you should learn when to keep their hands to themselves.

ALISHA.I... am afraid, it may prove difficult f: I am afraid, it may prove difficult for me to truly escape the worries of our land here
